properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html
properties.title: Role

properties.description: A term that best describes the genre of the image. A excellent source for terms is the Thesaurus for Graphic Materials from the Library of Congress - http://www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/tgm/
properties.title: Genre

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language term

properties.description: ASC number, or other local YUL identifier.
properties.title: Identifier (local)

properties.description: Any creator's descriptive system - example for negative assignments from the Computing and Network Services, Instructional Technology Centre they used assignments like: ITC assignment 85-946
properties.title: Identifier (other)

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: Name of a country, i.e. a political entity considered a country.
properties.title: Country

properties.description: Includes first order political divisions called provinces within a country, e.g. in Canada.
properties.title: Province

properties.description: Includes regions that have status as a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
properties.title: Region

properties.description: Name of the largest local administrative unit in various countries, e.g. England.
properties.title: County

properties.description: Name of an inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
properties.title: City

properties.description: Name of a smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., neighborhoods, parks, or streets.
properties.title: City Section

properties.description: Contains a statement of coordinates covered by the resource.
properties.title: Coordinates
